name: Spend Money
desc: Imagine, you live in Turkey and you win the New Year's jackpot. Approximately 400 million Turkish liras. How would you spend this money?

name: Notes App
desc: Color the tasks you will do and add them to the system. Search through tasks and delete tasks if necessary.

name: Dice Game
desc: Try to guess the random dice number! If the guess is successful, you win points, if not, you lose points.

name: E-Commerce
desc: See the products in list form, add the desired product to your cart, see the product detail page and clear the product from your cart at any time.
